Name: Jesus Sacred Heart
About the game: In this small trivia game, I pretend to make you familiar with four catholic devotions: -Sacred Heart of Jesus -Immaculate Heart of Mary -Chase Heart of Joseph -The Most Holy Rosary The game contains 5 scenes. One with each above devotion, explaining all symbols and other items. The 4th scene will teach you interactively how to pray The Most Holy Rosary. The 5th scene is a trivia game with over 50 questions in where your divine knowledge will be tested Hope you enjoy it, and learn from it! “‘“The Lord bless you and keep you; the Lord make his face shine on you and be gracious to you; the Lord turn his face toward you and give you peace.”’ Matthew 10:33 But whosoever shall deny me before men, him will I also deny before my Father which is in heaven. /
